contentList.content: Power increases your damage by 3% per point.
Increases your movement speed by 0.3m and attack range by 0.25m per point. Also grants 2% accuracy per point.
Regenerates 1% Vitality each turn per point and increases maximum Willpower by 1 for every 5 points.

Range: [1]
Encouraged boosts target's Power, Finesse, Resolve and Constitution stats by 1.

Range: [1]
Encouraged boosts target's Power, Finesse, Resolve and Constitution stats by 1.
Base slots: [1]. Extra slots from Intellect: +[2].
[1] gives you [2] extra points in your Intellect attribute.
Grants you an additional skill slot per point, and gives an additional use of Cooldown Reset in combat per every 2 points.
Each point in Wisdom grants +2% Critical Hit Chance and boosts your healing effects by 5% of Vitality restored. Also helps you perceive traps and hidden items.
[1] causes your attacks during combat to knock enemies back by 2m per point. May be toggled at will.
[1] grants one use of Source Replenishment per point, which restores 1 Source Point.
[1] regenerates 15% of your damage dealt as Vitality per level.

[1] grants the wielder the power to wield wind and electricity through a variety of spells.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Static Battery
When any character is Shocked, gain a charge. You may cast Lightning Strike at any time to consume all stacks, calling down a strike for each. You are immune to Stunned and absorb Shocked.

[1] grants access to destructive fire spells and various skills with beneficial effects.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Cataclysm
Applying Burning or Necrofire to an already ignited target generates an explosion, burning nearby foes.

[1] grants access to skills that manipulate the earth, bolster defenses and conjure poison.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Aftershock
Your first skill each turn generates a seismic shock around the area of impact, damaging nearby enemies and knocking them down.

[1] grants the wielder power over life and death through black magic.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Death Lord
Enemies you reduce to 15% Vitality or below perish instantly.

[1] grants access to water and ice-based magic, as well as a variety of healing spells.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Overflow
Healing and dealing damage generates Overflow Pools, which explode at the start of next turn, damaging foes and healing allies.

[1] grants access to high damage single-target melee-based attacks and various cunning tricks.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Death-Dealer
Your Critical Hits and Backstab Criticals reduce enemy resistances by 15% for 3 turns, stacking up to 3 times.

[1] grants access to special close-combat skills and defensive utility.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Total Warfare
Taking damage over 5% max Vitality with a melee weapon equipped triggers an almighty cleave that strikes all nearby foes. Does not benefit from lifesteal effects.

[1] grants access to a versatile array of shape-shifting skills.

Passive: Protean
Each point invested in [1] grants an additional Attribute point.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Evolution
All transformations last forever, including elemental skin.
[1] grants you +2 Initiative per point and grants Dodging, Movement and Resistance bonuses to all allies in a 13m radius.

[1] grants access to bow-based weapon skills and a number of survival tricks.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Deadshot
You never miss an attack. Your projectile skills additionally bounce off to the nearest applicable target.

[1] grants access to fiendish Summoning spells and mysterious extraplanar magic.

Level 6 Mastery Talent: Eldritch Ruler
Increases Summon limit by 1.
[1] restores 1 Willpower per point upon removal or expiry of a Willpower-draining effect.
[1] reflects damage received to your attacker.
With [1], you start every combat round with Maximum AP, but do not benefit from Willpower.
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Power.
Damage is based on your attack and receives a bonus from Power.
Damage may be reduced by resistances.
The stats of the summons will depend on the caster's level and attributes.
Huntsman skills advance archers and rangers. Read this book to learn this skill.
Warfare skills are skills for warriors and close-range combatants. Read this book to learn this skill.

Conjure a personal elemental that matches the ground surface it's summoned onto. Your Incarnate can be buffed with Infusions. Once you hit Summoning ability level of 5, a colossal Incarnate Champion will answer your summons!
[1] characters suffer damage from all healing effects - including potions - but gain 50% Lifesteal. They cannot benefit from Blessed. In combat, their Bless skill also becomes its opposite...
Characters with Braveheart retaliate against attacks of opportunity, but cannot flee from combat.

[1] gives all magical skills a critical chance equal to your critical chance score.

This talent is added to all characters during combat by default.

[1] gives you the ability to perform attacks of opportunity.

This talent is added to all characters during combat by default.

[1] permits your character [2] AP worth of free movement per turn.

This talent is added to all characters during combat by default.
[1] lets you heal from poison, but regular healing will damage you instead.

With [1], the duration of damage statuses caused by you is extended by one turn. Burning, Poisoned, Bleeding, Necrofire, Acid, Suffocating, Entangled, Death Wish, Shackles of Pain and Ruptured Tendons are affected by this talent.
Hydrosophist skills are Water-based magic spells.
Next Level [1]: Another 15% Lifesteal per level.
Next Level [1]: You gain +[2] Initiative, allies gain +[2]% Dodging and +[3]% to all resistances.
Level [1]: You gain +[2] Initiative, allies gain +[2]% Dodging and +[3]% to all resistances.

[1] provides +[2] Max AP, +[3] Recovery AP, +[4]% Vitality and doubles invested points in attributes - up to a maximum of 20 - and combat abilities - up to a maximum of 6 - while you are adventuring solo or with at most one companion. This bonus is temporarily removed while there are more than two members in the current party.
Willpower increased. Attacking enemies will become Chilled.
[1] equally distributes statuses you successfully receive to all other characters within 3m.
[1] absorbs blood surfaces to heal you and restores a small amount of Vitality when any nearby character dies.
[1] refunds used skillbooks. In combat, using three skills of the same school in a row restores 1 Action Point.
[1] reduces the cost of using grenades and scrolls by [2] AP when your offhand is free. Additionally, your first equipment change per turn costs nothing.
[1] enables you to talk to animals. Beasts of the wild will occasionally come to your aid when you strike a foe.
[1] gives you +[2]% extra Vitality and +2% to all Resistances (including physical) for every point in Warfare.

A character with [1] has an extra [2]% [3], but takes a [4]% penalty to [5]. Demon gives an additional +3% Fire Resistance each time a Pyrokinetic spell is cast, while Ice King gives immunity to Chilled, Frozen and Slipping.
[1] gives you [2]% Dodging while dual wielding. When missed by an attack in close range, you retaliate.
While sneaking, [1] increases attack damage by [2]% and causes attacks to inflict Atrophy. Also reduces cost of entering sneak mode by [3] AP.
[1] increases the range of skills and scrolls by [2]m and boosts your damage by 20%. Enemy characters within 4 meters decrease your damage by 40%, however.
[1] gives you [2]% chance to recover a special arrow after shooting it.
Chance of Frost Aegis, which protects the wearer against statuses.
You taunt all nearby enemies upon entering combat, challenging them to attack you. When resurrected, you resurrect to full health and suffer no stat penalties from Resurrection Sickness.
[1] gives you [2] to Constitution and +[3] to Power.
You can move heavy items by increasing your Power or investing points in Telekinesis.
Next skill will create a seismic shock, damaging and knocking down foes.
You shouldn't be reading this. Please report it to the mod author.
Healing spells and potions will always damage this cruel, cruel person.
Character is sending 100% of healing to linked character.
Character is receiving healing from linked character.
Character's constitution is boosted by the flesh and bone of nearby corpses.
Quality reading material has inspired this character, boosting their productivity.
You are the weakest link. Goodbye.
Nearby enemies are making it hard to concentrate.
Afflicted by a nearby Plaguestricken character: damage and Vitae decreased.
This character is disguised as another person and has temporarily befriended their allies.
Unless prevented, this character will flee from combat at the start of their next turn.
Character is sending [1]% of healing to linked character.
Character is receiving healing from linked character.
This character is in a state of hysterics, spreading it to those around them.
Character's physical and earth resistances are raised, but will take extra damage from water, fire and electricity.
Gaining stacks when nearby characters in combat are Shocked.
Enemies reduced below 15% Vitality by this character will die instantly.
Character's skills create damaging seismic shocks in the area targeted.
This character never misses. Their projectiles fork to nearby targets.
This character's healing and damaging effects generate pools of water, which explode to heal allies and damage foes.
Character's transformations last forever, including elemental skins.
This character's burning effects cause already-burning targets to explode.
Backstabs and Critical Hits apply Vulnerable, reducing resistances by 15% per stack.
This character's conjury is unmatched, allowing them to control one additional summoned creature.
Damage sustained will cause this character to retaliate with an almighty cleave.
Acting as a meat shield, this character is protecting nearby allies.
50% of incoming damage is being redirected to a nearby meat shield.
[1]% of incoming damage is redirected to a nearby Ally.
Character is infused with life, gaining extra Vitality.
Character is Plaguestricken, infecting nearby characters with disease.
Character is shielded from 25% of incoming damage.
The next skill used by this character will instantly reset its cooldown.
Seized by a zombie, rendered immobile and suffering [1] each turn. Broken by killing the attacker.
Character has rusty iron skin, making them incredibly slow.
You feel the strangest sense of impending doom...
Preventing nearby allies from taking damage.
Character is invulnerable, shielded from incoming damage by a nearby defender.
Character is heavily reducing incoming damage.
Character is sending 100% of healing to linked character.
Character is receiving healing from linked character.
Source casting has been disrupted and movement is nigh impossible.
Your fleshy disguise is at risk of being exposed! Keep your distance from those whom your mask may offend.

Resisting one more disabling effect.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.

Resisting two more disabling effects.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.

Resisting three more disabling effects.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.

Resisting four more disabling effects.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.

Resisting five more disabling effects.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.

Resisting six more disabling effects.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.

Resisting seven more disabling effects.

Resists Knocked Down, Fear, Stunned, Frozen, Petrified, Sleeping, Charmed, Mad, Chicken Form and Transfixed.
Chowing down on a nearby target, immobilising them and healing [1] each turn.
Character is beaming with energy, blinding all enemies in [1] radius.
Consumes blood surfaces to restore Vitality.
Character's constitution is boosted by the flesh and bone of nearby corpses.
Rake the earth with black magic, pulling enemies close. Deals [1].
Rake the earth with black magic, pulling enemies close. Deals [1].
Silence enemies in a cone in front of you, dealing [1].
Deal [1] to targets in a cone, setting Acid and Atrophy.
Let loose an icy wind, freezing enemies in place and dealing [1].
Breathe flames in a cone, dealing [1] and leaving fire surface behind.
Smash your weapon into the ground, knocking down all characters in front of you, and hitting them for [1]. Also clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.
Apply Frozen and deal [1] in a cone. Enemies that are Frozen and below 10% Vitality die instantly.
Silence enemies in a cone in front of you, dealing [1].
Shoot a thin torrent of blessed steam in front of you. Set Regeneration on allies.
The character receives bonus damage based on missing Vitality, minus 50%. Deals [1] damage each turn.
*Protest that if you're a monster for killing people, he's hardly any better for trying to kill you.*
Heh, maybe you're right. Maybe we're both monsters. But in that case, there's only one thing monsters can do.
*He gives you a long, cool look. Then smiles.*
*Quirk an eyebrow: how exactly are you a monster?*
Ask the people you've slain when I send you to the grave. The path you've walked is thick with blood and death.
I'm Gerald, the Watcher. Protector of man and slayer of monsters. You, Godwoken, are more monster than man.
*He stares at you silently for a long moment, then gathers his cloak tighter around himself.*
*Roll your eyes. You intend to dispatch with this self-righteous idiot quickly.*
Well, well, well. What have we here?
It's your Source. You've got just the kind of power I'm after, so I'll be taking it from your corpse, if it's all the same to you.
But I noticed, and you'd better believe I came prepared. See? I brought friends!
Once upon a time, y'see, I was Godwoken too. Duna was all too happy to help me out, fill my head with thoughts that I was special, that I could one day become Divine...
*She looks you up and down. A smile breaks across her face.*
*Nod your understanding and ready your weapon.*
What's this? Awww, have you been hoping for an audience with little old me?
*She pauses for just a moment before answering.*
You're a savvy one, you are. Trying to bait my attention like that.
*Eye her cautiously. What does she want with you?*
Godwoken. And a right tasty-looking one at that.
*Tell her to wait - why does she need your power?*

But after I used my god-given powers for this an' that, he changed his tone. Apparently, his 'Chosen One' was wasting too much time settling old scores. So he took them away - leaving me in a real do-or-die situation.
*A Necromancer? Tell her she's the sort of person Rivellon would be better off without.*
I've some old debts to pay off, let's just say.
I wasn't talking about your body, love.
Let's try this again, shall we?
*She taps a finger against her forehead.*
Once I've drained you dry, I'll teach him his mistake.
*The look she shoots you is withering enough to ruin a harvest.*
*You're familiar with this song and dance now. Draw your weapon and be done with her.*
Aha ha! You're smarter than you look.
Create a magic field that shields allies in the area from incoming damage for 2 turns.

Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [1].
A shot that deals [1] and receives [2]% bonus damage per 1m distance to target.

Shoot a bolt of healing energy that will jump to nearby allies.
Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to [2] times in a [3] radius and deals [1] to each target.

Stunned makes target unable to move or act.
Can target some surfaces and clouds to electrify them.
Throw [1] explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [1] of a random type, and then creates a corresponding surface.
Launch a blade at every enemy around you, dealing [1]. Can backstab when used with daggers.
Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [1].
Target 3 positions and shoot an ice shard at each one, dealing [1] and making targets Chilled.
Send a cursed flame that will split on impact up to [1] times, dealing [2] and leaving a cursed fire surface behind.
Knock down a target and deal [1] damage.
Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.
Throw an explosive trap at target location. Trap takes 1 turn to activate. When active, the trap will explode when a character approaches it.
Throw an Oil Blob at target point, dealing [1] damage in the area. Oil Blob deals earth damage with melee attacks and leaves an oil puddle on death.
Target is Marked, decreasing its ability to Dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.
Fire three arrows at three targets of your choice, each dealing [1].

Range: [2]
Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.
Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes [1], ignoring resistances.
Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal [1].
Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals [1].
A long-ranged attack that deals [1] damage. Deals double damage if done from stealth.
Launch a magical missile from your staff that deals [1].

Range: [2]
Launches a magical missile that inherits the power and damage type of the staff. The better the staff, the more damage this spell sows. Can target terrain.
Deal immense Air damage in an area around you and Shock targets hit.
Throw dust at an area, blinding targets and dealing [1]. Clears surfaces and clouds.
Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing [1]. Can backstab!
An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [1] to characters in the area and setting Shocked status.
[3] ice shards rain from the sky, each dealing [1] to characters within the storm's radius.

Range: [4]
Frozen makes target unable to move or act, but target gains armor and fire resistance.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.
Deal [1] damage and Knock Down enemy characters and items around you. Creates [2] random oil surfaces within the area.
Scarecrows are called that for a reason...
Wordless does not speak and, today, neither do you.
Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies. Douse fire surfaces.
Rush forward in a straight line to a point far away, hitting all enemies in your path for [1].
Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 2 Action Points next turn. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost and every successive use during a single turn decreases the amount gained by 1.
Perform a whirlwind attack, hitting enemies around you for [1].
Gain 2 Constitution and another 2 Constitution for every corpse in the area around you.
Deal [1] to all nearby enemies and knock them flying back.
Link your Vitality to all nearby allies, healing them when you receive healing.
Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you.
Disable Pet Pal's creature summons, which are currently enabled.
Enable Pet Pal's creature summons, which are currently disabled.
Cause your next skill to instantly come off cooldown.
Spread debilitating plague to all nearby enemies, drastically reducing their stats.
Gain 2 Constitution and another 2 Constitution for every corpse in the area around you.
Remove the following negative statuses from yourself: Slowed, Crippled, Chilled, Shocked, Silenced, Suffocating, Disarmed, Diseased, Infectious Diseased, Shackles of Pain.
Creates a bubble of clean air around your head, allowing you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces. Provides immunity to Suffocating and Silenced.
Grants you the power to blend in with any environment as if Invisible.
Consume Frozen surfaces around you and convert them to Vitality over 2 turns. Cleanses and grants immunity to Decaying, Diseased and Frozen.
Projectiles that hit you or explode in a 2m radius around you are reflected back at the caster. This does not prevent original projectile effects.
Deal [1] to enemies around you; then creates cursed static clouds on the edges of the spell.
Guide your allies with blustering winds, allowing them to move around you without restraint.
An aura that adds [1] to all weapon attacks for nearby allies.
You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire.
Flaming Tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies and burning those who simply linger too close.
Gain 1 Action Point immediately and a [2]% damage boost for 2 turns at the cost of [1]% Vitality. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.
Regenerate nearby non-Undead allies' Vitality. Undead and Decaying enemies receive damage.
Set Chilled on enemies around you and deal [1] damage. Freeze all susceptible surfaces.
Nearby allies redirect [1]% of received damage to you.
The earth itself laments your plight, crying curative tears which heal all allies that move close to you for aid.
Sets off a chain reaction that causes ice areas to explode into water puddles, dealing water damage and setting Chilled.
You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice.
You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage. You bleed electrified water.
Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid.
Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a Petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns.
Imbue nearby allies' with life, increasing their Vitality by 15% for 2 turns.
Consume Oil surfaces around you and convert them to Vitality over 2 turns. Cleanses and grants immunity to Slowed, Shocked and Frozen.
You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison.
Poison erupts from the caster in a circular wave, dealing [1] and forming poison clouds. Gives immunity to poison and earth damage for one turn.
Deal damage based on your current Vitality ([1]) in a wave of metal spikes to everyone in the area, including yourself.
Gain Safeguard Aura, sharply reducing damage taken by nearby allies.
Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to all weapon attacks dependent upon the size of poison area cleared.
Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding you from sight.
Receive Sparkstriker status. This causes your melee attacks to create a Spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy.
Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to entangle other characters. You will become Hasted rather than Enwebbed when walking across webs. Incompatible with Wings.
Regenerate lost limbs, slowly replenishing Vitality. Removes Atrophy, Crippled and Decaying.
Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing [1] in a large area around you (except areas blocked by obstacles).
Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you.
Deal [1] damage in a 5m radius and gain an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies.
Set Vampiric Hunger on every ally around you, adding [1]% Life Steal. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.
Coat your weapons with poison, adding [1] to your weapon skills and attacks.
Perform a whirlwind attack, hitting enemies around you for [1].
Sprout temporary wings to fly when you move, allowing you to ignore ground surfaces. Incompatible with Spider Legs.
Open an interdimensional rift to summon a powerful Eldritch Gatekeeper. After a turn passes, the Gatekeeper will emerge and instantly kill a random nearby character, whether friend or foe.
Summon an extremely fragile creature of chaotic magic to deal heavy damage from afar.
Offer your lifeblood to summon a Parasitic Heart to this plane, sacrificing <font color="a60228">half of your current Vitality</font> to summon a demon that heals allies by tormenting foes.
Summon a demon of pain and torment to this realm, terrorizing foes in an area.
Raise a walking construct of bones which can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking Damage buff.
Conjure two linked gateways that allow any character to instantly travel between them up to four times.
This creature is a summon and gains its summoner's attributes. If the summoner dies, so will the creature.
Transport pickupable items in the target area into your inventory.
Fully restore target character's Willpower. Removes Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted and Madness.
Remove Burning, Necrofire, Wet, Chilled and Frozen from a target. You then deal +[1]% damage until the end of turn.
Drive a target mad, encouraging them to spread the madness to nearby characters.
Deal [1] to target character. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage.
Shapeshift into the likeness of a dead target, befriending their allies for the duration. Attacking or using skills will reveal your true form.
Regenerate lost limbs and wounds, slowly replenishing a target's Vitality. Removes Atrophy, Crippled and Decaying.
Call down a blast of lightning per stack of <font color="#786bcb">Static Charge</font>.
Strike below the belt, dealing [1] and Taunting your foe, forcing them to attack you. Has a very high Critical Hit chance.
Drive a target mad, encouraging them to spread the madness to nearby characters.
Resurrect a target from death to assist you until combat ends.
Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

Range: [1]
Charmed status temporarily turns a target's allegiance around.
Mark a target so that it will receive all the damage you receive. Damage transferred in this way ignores any resistances the target may have.
Raise a large zombie from target corpse, providing cover to nearby allies.
Raise a large zombie from target corpse, providing cover to nearby allies.
Raise a large zombie from target corpse, providing cover to nearby allies.
Instantly relocate to a water surface and set Wet. Create puddles at your start and end points.
Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

Range: [1]
Charmed status temporarily turns a target's allegiance around.
Bless target character or surface, bestowing 1 Willpower. Removes Diseased, Decaying, Petrified, Stunned, Frozen, Plague, Silenced and Atrophy.
Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they will be healed!

Target gains Clear-Minded, which increases Finesse, Resolve and Wisdom by [1] as well as both Initiative and Critical Hit Chance by [2]. Removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.
Consume target summon to regain health.
Mark target enemy. If they die in the next 3 turns, you are healed and receive a damage bonus. If the target survives, they receive the bonuses and you receive damage.
Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

Range: [1]
Charmed status temporarily turns a target's allegiance around.
Heal target and create a water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned and Bleeding.
Turn water and blood surfaces into oil. Remove Stun and Shocked from characters.
Explode target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area.
Destroy [1] on target character, and set Acid status.
Blade attack that deals [1] and sets Decay and Diseased.
Target ally enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage, and heal over time. Removes Shackles of Pain.
Launch into a barrage of 5 stabs, each dealing [1].
Target character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point for 2 turns. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration.

Target character takes [1] per turn and receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their missing Vitality below 50%. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 20% damage bonus - but a character with 70% Vitality will gain a -20% damage bonus.
Deal [1] to target character. Sets Decay, so the target will take physical damage from healing effects and potions.

Range: [1]
Decay makes healing spells and potions damage the target instead.
Exchange Vitality percentages with target character, provided they have no remaining Willpower.
Deal [1] to a target. Drain their Willpower and add it to yours.
Change Incarnate's element to electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge.
Target a surface in melee radius. Elemental damage matching that surface is added to your weapon attacks and skills.

Motivate an allied character with the power of rage. Target allied character is guaranteed to land critical hits with basic attacks and weapon skills, but is muted. Clears Taunted, Terrified, Charmed, Mad and Clear-Minded statuses.
Vitality percentages of characters in target area are summed up and redistributed equally.
Target character's Dodging is increased by 90% and Movement Speed is increased by 20%.
Increase the range of a target character's ranged attacks by 4m and grant them a bonus to critical hit chance.
Enemies will bleed fire when hit. Reduces Fire Resistance by [1]%. Also creates a small fire surface beneath each target and ignites surfaces in the area.
Changes Incarnate's element to fire, unlocking Fireball.
Long range attack that deals [1] damage, leaving the target Blind and Burning.
Curse the target to explode in 2 turns or on death for [1].
Attack 5 times with astonishing speed, each hit dealing [1].
Fortify your target with a stony shell, reducing all Physical damage they receive. While Fortified, the target cannot be teleported. Removes Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning.

Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, increasing resistance to damage, granting Immunity to Knocked Down, Atrophy, Crippled, Chilled and Frozen. Further cures Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Suffocating and Petrified.
Undead hands rise from underground, attacking enemy characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [1] to each character and sets Crippled.
Target character regenerates Vitality according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.
Sets Hasted on target character. Haste increases movement speed by 2m per AP and gives an additional 1 AP per turn. Clears Slowed, Crippled and Knocked Down.
Deal [1]. Infect a target with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased characters deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Constitution.
Deal [1] to target character. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage.
Sing, causing enemies in the target area to become Mad. Maddened characters will attack those nearest them, regardless of alignment.
Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitoes to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing [1] and healing yourself.
Deal [1]. If your target's Willpower is lower than yours, instantly remove it all. Sets Knocked Down.
Changes Incarnate's element to poison, unlocking Poison Dart.
Unlock Whirlwind and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [1] (amount depends on your level). Increases damage by [2]%.
Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals [1] to enemies and douses fire.
Unlocks ranged attack on a Summon. Increases damage by [2].
Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies that move within.
Restore Vitality of a target character. Restoration also cures Poisoned, Bleeding and Burning.
Spikes impale all characters and items, setting Crippled and dealing [1]. Also creates an oil puddle.
If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory.
Pierces the enemy's Physical Armour and directly deals [1]. Sets Bleeding.
Mark a target so that it will receive all the damage you receive. Damage transferred in this way ignores any resistances the target may have.
Target summon learns how to turn invisible and strike foes with a corrosive slash. Increases damage by 25%.
Strike your opponent with an unexpected blow, dealing [1] and knocking them back a long distance.
Deal [1] damage and set Atrophy: your target can't use weapons or weapon skills anymore.
Bind yourself to target character, copying any healing you receive to them. Clears Frozen, Stunned, Knocked Down and Petrified.
Consume a corpse to gain a Source Point, or steal a Source Point from a living character. Resisted by Willpower.
Deal [1] to target character. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.
Deal [1] and set a status that halves resistances.
Target totem or summon deals [1]% more base damage during its next turn, but then dies.
Perform a vicious blade attack that deals [1], setting Bleeding and Terrified on your target and all nearby enemies.
Target a character: when they end a turn in combat, they immediately receive a free turn.
Deal [1]. Set Suffocating and Silence on target.
Set Vampiric Hunger on target character, adding [1]% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.
Remove Petrified and Frozen from target character. Vaporise ground surfaces into clouds. Does not work on Oil, Ice or Lava surfaces.
Target summon learns a teleport skill and a skill to swap places with its master. Increases damage by 25%.
Changes Incarnate's element to water, unlocking Restoration.
Deal [1] and set Chilled status on characters in the area. Freeze blood and water surfaces.

Deals [1] to each character in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area who is not protected by Willpower. Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive poison damage each turn.
Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing.

Target range: [2]
Target can be moved [3] away from its position.

Select item or character first, then select its destination.
Sacrifice your lifeblood to bring an ally back to life. Deals [1] damage to you and resurrects an ally with maximum Vitality.
Make two characters switch places. One of the characters can be you.
Target two circular areas. Swap surfaces and clouds.
A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.
Vines sprout from the ground to block the path in a target area, emitting poison clouds around them.
Summon a line of intense heat that deals [1] damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind.
